title: Do I Wanna Know?
author: Arctic Monkeys
lyrics:
[00:30.27] Have you got colour in your cheeks?
[00:35.49] Do you ever get the fear that you can't shift the type
[00:39.04] That sticks around like summat in your teeth?
[00:42.70] Are there some aces up your sleeve?
[00:46.61] Have you no idea that you're in deep?
[00:49.49] I dreamt about you nearly every night this week
[00:54.21] How many secrets can you keep?
[00:58.22] 'Cause there's this tune I found
[01:00.20] That makes me think of you somehow
[01:02.93] And I play it on repeat
[01:06.35] Until I fall asleep
[01:09.60] Spilling drinks on my settee
[01:13.62] (Do I wanna know?)
[01:16.52] If this feeling flows both ways?
[01:19.55] (Sad to see you go)
[01:22.12] Was sorta hoping that you'd stay
[01:25.16] (Baby, we both know)
[01:27.60] That the nights were mainly made
[01:30.59] For saying things that you can't say tomorrow day
[01:35.55] Crawling back to you
[01:38.78] Ever thought of calling when you've had a few?
[01:44.19] 'Cause I always do
[01:47.25] Maybe I'm too
[01:50.24] Busy being yours to fall for somebody new
[01:55.84] Now I've thought it through
[01:58.34] Crawling back to you
[02:01.44] So have you got the guts?
[02:05.78] Been wondering if your heart's still open
[02:09.04] And if so, I wanna know what time it shuts
[02:14.01] Simmer down and pucker up
[02:17.07] I'm sorry to interrupt, it's just I'm constantly on the cusp
[02:21.92] Of trying to kiss you
[02:27.22] I don't know if you feel the same as I do
[02:35.14] But we could be together if you wanted to
[02:43.96] (Do I wanna know?)
[02:46.77] If this feeling flows both ways?
[02:49.89] (Sad to see you go)
[02:52.58] Was sorta hoping that you'd stay
[02:55.42] (Baby, we both know)
[02:58.12] That the nights were mainly made
[03:00.98] For saying things that you can't say tomorrow day
[03:05.88] Crawling back to you (crawling back to you)
[03:09.60] Ever thought of calling when you've had a few? (You've had a few?)
[03:15.60] 'Cause I always do ('cause I always do)
[03:18.26] Maybe I'm too busy (maybe I'm too busy)
[03:21.33] Busy being yours to fall for somebody new
[03:26.26] Now I've thought it through
[03:28.62] Crawling back to you
[03:30.75] (Do I wanna know?)
[03:32.45] If this feeling flows both ways?
[03:35.08] (Sad to see you go)
[03:37.87] Was sorta hoping that you'd stay
[03:40.86] (Baby, we both know)
[03:43.47] That the nights were mainly made
[03:46.36] For saying things that you can't say tomorrow day
[03:51.82] (Do I wanna know?)
[03:54.31] Too busy being yours to fall
[03:57.85] (Sad to see you go)
[04:00.14] Ever thought of calling darling?
[04:03.88] (Do I wanna know?)
[04:05.95] Do you want me crawling back to you?
[04:09.55]
